# aillc-org Documentation

Welcome to the comprehensive documentation for aillc-org, an enterprise-ready AWS Organization management tool with automated account provisioning and Control Tower integration.

## üìö Documentation Structure

### User Documentation
- [Getting Started Guide](getting-started.md) - Quick setup and first steps
- [User Guide](user-guide.md) - Complete guide to using the CLI
- [Configuration Reference](configuration.md) - Environment variables and settings
- [FAQ](faq.md) - Frequently asked questions

### Architecture & Design
- [Architecture Overview](architecture.md) - System design and components
- [StackSet Templates](stacksets.md) - CloudFormation templates and their purpose
- [Security Model](security.md) - IAM roles, SCPs, and security best practices

### Development
- [Development Setup](development.md) - Setting up your development environment
- [Contributing Guide](contributing.md) - How to contribute to the project
- [Testing Guide](testing.md) - Running and writing tests
- [API Reference](../pdoc/index.html) - Auto-generated API documentation

### Operations
- [Deployment Guide](deployment.md) - Deploying to production
- [Monitoring & Alerts](monitoring.md) - CloudWatch dashboards and alerts
- [Troubleshooting](troubleshooting.md) - Common issues and solutions
- [Disaster Recovery](disaster-recovery.md) - Backup and recovery procedures
